results.description: Australia batsman Marnus Labuschagne signs a new contract with Glamorgan after his starring role in the Ashes series against England.
results.shortTitle: Labuschagne signs new Glamorgan deal
results.title: Marnus Labuschagne: Glamorgan sign Australia batsman to two-year deal

results.description: Matthew Maynard targets promotion and silverware after signing a new deal as Glamorgan head coach.
results.shortTitle: Maynard targets silverware with Glamorgan
results.title: Matthew Maynard: Coach targets silverware with Glamorgan

results.description: Glamorgan re-appoint Matthew Maynard as head coach for the next three years after an interim role in 2019.
results.shortTitle: Maynard retains Glamorgan coaching job
results.title: Matthew Maynard: Glamorgan re-appoint coach on three-year deal

results.description: Glamorgan's Chris Cooke hopes playing for Birmingham Phoenix in the Hundred will take him out of his comfort zone and raise his game.
results.shortTitle: Cooke hopes Hundred can raise standard
results.title: The Hundred: Glamorgan's Cooke hopes Hundred can raise standard

results.description: Australian batsman Steve Smith could lead cosmopolitan Welsh Fire in first season of the Hundred tournament.
results.shortTitle: Australia star Smith could lead Welsh Fire
results.title: The Hundred: Australia star Steve Smith could captain Welsh Fire

results.description: Jonny Bairstow believes the Welsh Fire squad selection for the inaugural Hundred tournament has the right blend of youth and experience.
results.shortTitle: The Hundred: Bairstow targets success with Welsh Fire
results.title: The Hundred: Welsh Fire's Jonny Bairstow targets more good times

results.description: Australian stars Steve Smith and Mitchell Starc will be part of the Welsh Fire squad for the inaugural Hundred competition in 2020.
results.shortTitle: Welsh Fire pick Smith and Starc
results.title: The Hundred: Welsh Fire pick Steve Smith and Mitchell Starc

results.description: Glamorgan hand new one-year contracts to keeper-batsman Tom Cullen and all-rounder Owen Morgan.
results.shortTitle: New Glam deals for Cullen and Morgan
results.title: Glamorgan Cricket: New contracts for Cullen and Morgan

results.description: Most of Glamorgan, Somerset and Gloucestershire's players opt in for the Hundred draft but may not end up at the Welsh Fire franchise.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan players opt in for Hundred
results.title: Welsh Fire: Glamorgan players opt in for Hundred draft

thumbnail.altText: Glamorgan's Colin Ingram is already confirmed as a Welsh Fire player

results.description: Glamorgan announce a contract extension for Graham Wagg and remain hopeful of re-signing Australian star Marnus Labuschagne.
results.shortTitle: New Glamorgan deal for all-rounder Wagg
results.title: Glamorgan: New deal for all-rounder Graham Wagg

results.description: Glamorgan veteran Michael Hogan is awarded a testimonial season by the county, but rules himself out of the new Hundred competition.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan's Hogan awarded testimonial
results.title: Glamorgan Cricket: Michael Hogan awarded testimonial

results.description: Glamorgan's former South Africa fast bowler Marchant de Lange signs a new two-year contract at the club.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan's De Lange signs new contract
results.title: Marchant de Lange: Glamorgan hand new deal to ex-South Africa paceman

results.description: With the 2019 county cricket season over, keep up to date with the latest signings, departures and rumours for 2020.
results.shortTitle: County ins and outs
results.title: County ins & outs - signings, departures and rumours

thumbnail.altText: Miguel Cummins has ended his West Indies career to join Middlesex as a Kolpak player

results.description: Glamorgan release all-rounder Jeremy Lawlor after five years in the first-team squad.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan release all-rounder Lawlor
results.title: Jeremy Lawlor: Glamorgan release all-rounder

results.description: Gloucestershire and Northants are promoted to Division One after both their game and Glamorgan's match at Durham are abandoned.
results.shortTitle: Glos & Northants promoted as Glamorgan draw
results.title: County Championship: Gloucestershire & Northants promoted to Division One as Glamorgan draw

results.description: Glamorgan interim head coach Matthew Maynard says his future is in limbo, after taking the side to fourth place in County Championship Division Two.
results.shortTitle: Coach Maynard unsure on Glamorgan future
results.title: Matthew Maynard: Coach unsure on Glamorgan future

results.description: Rain and sodden outfields causes major disruption in the County Championship once again on Wednesday.
results.shortTitle: Rain disrupts Championship schedule again
results.title: County Championship: Five games abandoned on Wednesday

results.description: Glamorgan's outside promotion hopes are dampened as day three of their match against Durham is rained off in Chester-le-Street.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan promotion hopes fade in Durham
results.title: County Championship: Glamorgan promotion hopes fade in Durham

results.description: Durham reach 262-8 against Glamorgan with BJ Watling reaching his century in the hour's play possible on day two.
results.shortTitle: Durham and Glamorgan foiled by rain
results.title: County Championship: Durham and Glamorgan foiled by rain

results.description: Ticket sales in English Twenty20 cricket soar in 2019 - and it's not just down to England winning the Cricket World Cup.
results.shortTitle: T20 ticket sales reach new peak in 2019
results.title: T20 Blast: Booming English ticket sales reach new peak in 2019 World Cup year
